Name: Insect Seeker
About the game: This game consists of finding the various insects hidden over the levels (a few other animals too). All levels are photographs with real insects -Natural sounds are present depending on the atmosphere of the photograph: Bird sounds, river, rain, waves ... - Bonuses are present to help in case of difficulty: search areas excluded, type of animal or insect, which insect or animal precisely you must find. -Once a type of insect is found, it becomes present in the bestiary with a large photograph and with its name followed by its Latin scientific name. -The levels have been separated into 7 difficulty levels, from 'Beginner' to 'Hardcore' allowing a calibration of the difficulty according to your level. -This game is for all ages and for the whole family to learn about the existence of insects and animals that we have never seen.
